title: Drawing, "Advertising Design for Veramon-Schering", ca. 1925
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right:  FD
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite across lower quarter of sheet:  IL PHOOTOR FRUTTO/DELLA FATTCAE/IL MAL DI TESTA/IL VERAMON/LO SOPPRIME
provenance: Galleria d'arte Cortina di Renzo Cortina, Piazza Cavour 1 Milan
description: Oval head with features of Aboriginal mask:  large, round eyes; triangular nose, and semi-circular mouth.  Head is wrapped in wide ribbon with double leaves on either side of head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Advertising Design for Veramon-Schering", ca. 1925.
ca. 1925. Graphite on paper. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2000-20-16.
